title: Apply for probate
header: You are invited to apply online
introduction: Use this service to apply for probate (also known as a ‘grant of probate’ or a ‘grant of representation’) in England and Wales
paragraph1: Fill in the application online, then send the will and death certificate to the probate registry by post.
paragraph2: It costs £215 to apply for probate if the value of the estate is more than £5,000. It’s free if the value is less.
paragraph3: Extra copies of the grant of probate cost 50p each.
paragraph4: You’ll need to pay online by debit or credit card.
paragraph5: We’re currently building this service. If you notice things that don’t work as well as they should, you can use the ‘feedback’ link at the top of the page.
